metadata.title: CVE-2021-30547 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Out of bounds write in ANGLE in Google Chrome prior to 91.0.4472.101 allowed a remote attacker to potentially perform out of bounds memory access via a crafted HTML page.

notes.note: amurray> The Debian chromium source package is called chromium-browser in Ubuntu mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 19.10, the chromium-browser package is just a script that installs the Chromium snap

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '90.0+build1-0ubuntu0.21.04.1').
thunderbird package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:78.13.0+build1-0ubuntu0.21.04.2').
